submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumOperations(self, nums: List[int], target: List[int]) -> int:
        arr = []
        for i in range(len(nums)):
            arr.append(target[i]-nums[i])
        print(arr)
            
        count = 0
        
        i = 0
        prev = 0
        while i < len(arr):
            if arr[i]>0 and prev >0 and  prev <= arr[i]:
                count+=(arr[i]-prev)
                print(1, count)
                # prev = arr[i]
            elif arr[i]<0 and prev < 0 and prev >= arr[i]:
                count+=(prev-arr[i])
                print(2, count)
                
                # prev = arr[i]
            elif prev >= 0 and arr[i] < 0:
                count-=arr[i]
                print(3, count)
                # prev = arr[i]
            elif prev <=0 and arr[i] > 0:
                count+=arr[i]
                print(4, count)
            
            prev =arr[i]
            i+=1
                
        return count
